scripts.e2e:ios: npx detox build -c ios.sim.release -l error && NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx detox test -c ios.sim.release -l error --artifacts-location ../../artifacts/detox/ios --record-logs failing --take-screenshots failing --record-videos failing
scripts.e2e:android: npx detox build -c android.emu.release -l error && NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx detox test -c android.emu.release -l error --artifacts-location ../../artifacts/detox/android --record-logs failing --take-screenshots failing --record-videos failing
